Row.Text: Foreign Dignitary Abducted!

A dignitary visiting from {1_CityState} has been kidnapped from the streets in {2_City}! The incident has not only caused widespread panic throughout the city, but has damaged our relations with {1_CityState}.[NEWLINE]
Oh well...
We must find them at once!
I have a very particular set of skills...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {2_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {1_CityState}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {2_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {1_CityState}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lose {3_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} goes into 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
We have declined to respond to the recent abduction of a visiting emissary.
Following the abduction of a visiting emissary, we have pledged to use what resources we have to see them returned.

Following the abduction of a visiting emissary, we have pledged to use what skills we have to see them returned. In doing so, however, we have left in our wake a city half-destroyed by bombs and drive-bys!
An emissary visiting from {1_CityState} has been abducted in the {2_CivAdj} city of {3_CityName}.
Embezzling Politician
We have discovered to our dismay that an important member of our government has been embezzling state funds. We must decide what to do with them.[NEWLINE]
The politician must be held to account.
We should turn a blind eye for the time being.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose 1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
We have held to account a politician believed to be embezzling state funds.
Inclined toward their service in government, we have opted to ignore a politician believed to be embezzling state funds.
Fraudalant Species

A previously lauded discovery by a local scientist has turned out to be nothing more than a forgery! It is alleged that the scientist sowed together the parts to several animals, before asserting his claim on the discovery of a new species.[NEWLINE]
I expect that man's title to be stripped.
For the public's interest, let's say the thing is extinct.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have stripped the doctorate from a scientist involved in falsely asserting the discovery of a new animal.
For the good of the public, we have 'discovered' evidence that the fraudulant creation of a mad scientist, passed off as a new animal species, is actually extinct.
Heretic Preacher!
A local priest of {1_CityName} has begun to preach what is most undeniably heresy! We have been asked by our faithful to put a stop to it before our people are swayed by his lies.[NEWLINE]
Have the priest arrested!
We are a free society and the priest may practice as he pleases.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance that {1_CityName} will go into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} {3_YieldType}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} {2_YieldType}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have ordered the arrest of a priest spouting heresies, to little public objective.
We have ordered the arrest of a priest spouting heresies. However, his misguided followers have now risen up in protest!
We have ordered that a priest spouting heresies remain protected under the free society that we live, be it at cost to our piety.
Stockpile Stolen!

A stockpile of {1_ResourceIcon} {2_ResourceDesc} has reportedly gone missing. Whether it be at the hands of an enemy of the state or a disgruntled commander, we must surely look to recover these resources.[NEWLINE]
This will not do at all. This stockpile must be found.
We've more important matters to worry about.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} {2_Icon} {3_Desc}[ENDCOLOR]
We have managed to recover a stolen stockpile of {1_Icon} {2_Desc}. However, we were unable to ascertain as to the thief.
We have decided not to pursue the case of a stolen stockpile of {1_Icon} {2_Desc}. We shall simply recover the resources elsewhere.
A Friend's Betrayal
To our grave dismay, we have learnt that a great friend to us is at the helm of a conspiracy to see us dead. But like any other, they must be brought to face justice.[NEWLINE]
They must be arrested. But comfortably.
No punishment would surely render this heartache just. Kill them.
We must confront them.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Progress toward [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital is increased by {1_Num}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital goes into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Progress toward [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital is decreased by {1_Num}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital goes into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
Although we have had our conspiring friend arrested, they no doubt brood and await their opportunity to take their revenge.
Upon learning of the execution of their leader, a group of conspirators have given up their cause to see us dead.
Upon learning of the execution of their leader, a group of conspirators have staged a riot in the Capital.
Our confrontation with our conspiring friend has led to a peaceful resolution, but their co-conspirators have broken out in riot.
Statue Damaged!

Some villainous scoundral has torn the arm from one of our great statues in {1_City}, perhaps in conspiracy against our rule! It would cost much to repair the damage, however, it would cost equally to our legitimacy to leave it in its current state.[NEWLINE]
Demolish it.
We must repair it at once!
Find the culprits and put them to work on it!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The {1_BuildingDesc} in {3_City} is destroyed.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in {3_City}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_City} begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for {3_Num} turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold
We have decreed that a monument recently damaged by vandals be destroyed and the materials put to use elsewhere.
We have decreed the repairation of a monument recently damaged by vandals, and we pledge funds to this endeavour.
We have captured the vandals responsible for damaging a well-known monument, and have set them to work in repairing it.
Bread Riot!

People in the city of {1_City} have begun to protest over what they claim to be an exorbitant price to bread. They threaten violence and looting upon the local bakeries if they cannot be fed.[NEWLINE]
Let them eat cake!
Fire the milita upon them!
Then we must prioritize their contentment.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_City} enters [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance for 3 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_City} loses 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
A bread riot has broken out in {1_City} over the price of bread.
We have set the local militia to disperse a crowd threatening violence in protest over the price of bread, resulting in the death of several protestors and soldiers.
We have paid in gold to disperse a crowd threatening violence in protest over the price of bread.
Riots have broken out in the {1_CivAdj} city of {2_CityName} over the price of bread.
Rioters over the price of bread have been massacred in the {1_CivAdj} city of {2_CityName}.
Anarchist Student

A student showing particular promise at the University of {1_City} has unfortunately fallen in with a crowd of anarchists. We would not know of this had an advisor from the university not passed along this troubling news.[NEWLINE]
We cannot let this bright pupil fall to the malices of empassioned caprice.
There will be many more like him with better sense.
We should not interfere in the student's right to freedom.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance {1_City} goes into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]70% chance you gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]

We have intervened at the University of {1_City}, where a promising student has fallen in with a crowd of anarchists. Fortunately, the student saw the error of his ways and immediately renounced anarchism. Under no duress, we assure us.

We have intervened at the University of {1_City}, where a promising student has fallen in with a crowd of anarchists. Unfortunately, the student appears too far indoctrinated, and he and the anarchists have protested our noble efforts.
We have declined to interfere at the University of {1_City}, where a promising student has fallen in with a crowd of anarchists.
We have declined to interfere at the University of {1_City}, where a promising student has fallen in with a crowd of anarchists. It is difficult to know the scholarship that we have now lost.
Terrorist Attack!

Due to the current successful economic standing of our currency, some shrewd criminals have begun to manufacture counterfeits of it and are circulating it around in the market. Our economy and diplomatic relations are at stake.[NEWLINE]
Oh well...
We must find them at once!
I have a very particular set of skills...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]60% chance that all cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have won the animal tossing competition.
We have won the animal tossing competition.
We have won the animal tossing competition.
Terrorist Attack!
A local politician has been snatched by the shadows in {1_City}! The incident has caused widespread panic throughout the city and people are now unwilling to leave their homes at night.[NEWLINE]
Oh well...
We must find them at once!
I have a very particular set of skills...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]60% chance that all cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have won the animal tossing competition.
We have won the animal tossing competition.
We have won the animal tossing competition.
Terrorist Attack!

An explosion at the local {1_BuildingDesc} in {2_City} is believed to have been the work of a terrorist group! Concerns that a second attack is planned for the local {3_BuildingDesc} have surfaced.[NEWLINE]
We must do more to counter terrorism!
I'm certain it was but a random act of violence.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Police Station in {2_CityName}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance that the {1_BuildingDesc} is destroyed[ENDCOLOR]
"'The resolve of our great nation is being tested. But make no mistake, we will show the world that we will pass this test.'"
We are disinclined to believe that a recent explosion in one of our cities is a terrorist attack upon the nation.
A second attack upon a local {1_BuildingDesc} has suggested to us that we were in error to dismiss the claims that the nation was under terrorist attack.
A terrorist attack in the {1_CivAdj} city of {2_CityName} has left the nation on edge.
